title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Self-Directed Blended Learning for Small Vessel Operations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nautical terminology and understanding of ship structures
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform ship safety inspection procedures with 80% accuracy
Learners can independently plan basic navigation routes using an electronic chart system at least three times
Learners can explain four or more ship operation strategies based on weather conditions
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
